title: 9.9 Sorting characters in a string
description:
Write a function that returns a sorted string using the following header:

string sort(string &s)

For example, the following code output: abc

string s1("bca"), s2;

s2 = sort(s1);

cout << s2 << endl;
author: Liu Xiaoming
hint: 只提交string sort(string &s)函数实现，不要提交main()函数。
